intro.description: Brief introduction to the OWLDoc plugin

item.title: Task 1. Select OWLDoc export wizard
item.description: The OWLDOc export wizard can be selected from two different places: (1) File --> Export --> Other --> OWLDoc Export or (2) in the Ontology Navigator, double click and select Export --> Other --> OWLDoc Export

item.title: Task 2. Select ontology to export
item.description: In the new dialog, user have to select the ontology to be exported. The first combo allows the user to select a project from those availables in the workspace. The second combo allows the user to select an ontology from those availables in the porject selected previously. In the third field, the user has to enter the directory where the ontology will be exported.

item.title: Task 3. Export the ontology
item.description: Just click in the finish button to create the documentation of the ontology. When the process has finished, check that the documentation has been created properly. Just open the index.html file available in the directory selected in the previous step.
